title: The New Forest Path
subtle: Realistic (fiction), 59 words, Level B (Grade K), Lexile 50L
description: Use this book to capitalize on your students' love of exploring the outdoors. The New Forest Path catalogs, using simple sentences and engaging photographs, the sights a child might find on a stroll down a forest path. Students will have many opportunities to visualize, classify information, and practice decoding skills.
meta: bird, bug, flower, forest, leaves, moss, path
Use the reading strategy of visualizing to understand text
Initial Consonants : Discriminate initial consonant /b/ sound
Plural Nouns : Recognize and use plural nouns
High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency word see

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
